com.ziluck.factions.data.mongodb

Class MongoFaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ziluck.factions.data.LoadFaction
      • com.ziluck.factions.data.mongodb.MongoFaction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Faction, Messageable, Nameable

    public class MongoFaction
extends LoadFaction
    Faction implementation for saving to MongoDB.
    Author:
    Michael Ziluck

    • Constructor Detail

      • MongoFaction

        public MongoFaction()
        Empty constructor for the ORM to use.

      • MongoFaction

        public MongoFaction(long id,
                    String name,
                    User leader,
                    FactionType type)
        Create a new Faction with the given information. This should only be used when a new Faction is made, not to load an already existing Faction.
        Parameters:
        id - the uuid of the Faction.
        name - the name of the Faction.
        leader - the person making the new Faction.
        type - the type of the Faction.

    • Method Detail

      • save

        public void save()
        Description copied from interface: Faction
        Saves this Faction instance to the designated form of storage. This method will run asynchronously to ensure that it does not cause hesitation in the main thread. This means that saving very often causes no issues except traffic either to the database or the file system itself. Regardless, it should still be used sparingly to ensure as much efficiency as possible.

      • createWarp

        protected Warp createWarp(String name,
                          LazyLocation location,
                          String password)
        Description copied from class: LoadFaction
        Creates a new Warp object using the proper database implementation.
        Specified by:
        createWarp in class LoadFaction
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the warp.
        location - the location of the warp.
        password - the password for the warp.
        Returns:
        the newly created warp.

      • withdraw

        public void withdraw(User user,
                     double amount)
        Description copied from interface: Faction
        Withdraws the given amount from this Faction's balance.
        Parameters:
        user - the User that made the transaction.
        amount - the amount to withdraw.

      • deposit

        public void deposit(User user,
                    double amount)
        Description copied from interface: Faction
        Deposits the given amount into this Faction's balance.
        Parameters:
        user - the User that made the transaction.
        amount - the amount to deposit.

      • loadMembers

        public void loadMembers()
        Description copied from interface: Faction
        Loads all the Users that are a member of this Faction. This is not called when the Faction starts to reduce the number of Users that need to be kept loaded at a given time.

      • processNewMember

        protected void processNewMember(User user)
        Description copied from class: LoadFaction
        Handle adding a new member to the database. Users are a special case within the system as the entire chunk of information for a user is not also stored in a Faction. As such, this method allows each individual database set up to handle it manually.
        Specified by:
        processNewMember in class LoadFaction
        Parameters:
        user - the new user to process

      • getId

        public long getId()
        Description copied from interface: Faction
        Retrieves the id of the Faction. This will auto-increment in the database. The Wilderness will have an id of -1.
        Returns:
        the id of the Faction.

      • loadLeader

        public void loadLeader()
        Description copied from class: LoadFaction
        Load the leader of the Faction from it's stored id.
        Specified by:
        loadLeader in class LoadFaction
